law.catch_line: Location of CDL driver training school.
law.text: A CDL driver training school shall not be located within three hundred (300) feet of any governmental building in which is carried on any function having to do with the administration of any laws relating to motor vehicles.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 12, effective April 9, 2002. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 9.
